ðŸ“– Summary: WebLook is a command-line tool designed for capturing screenshots and recordings of web pages. It offers features such as configurable wait times, viewport sizes, JavaScript execution, and browser console log capture. The tool is intended to support local development workflows by providing a simple way to capture visual states of web applications.
